biotools.summary: Discovery of fusion circular RNAs in leukemia with KMT2A::AFF1 rearrangements. CircFusion is a new software tool to detect linear fusions and f-circRNAs from RNA-seq data, both in samples where the fusion breakpoint is known and in a discovery mode.

bioschemas.name: CircFusion
bioschemas.summary: Discovery of fusion circular RNAs in leukemia with KMT2A::AFF1 rearrangements. CircFusion is a new software tool to detect linear fusions and f-circRNAs from RNA-seq data, both in samples where the fusion breakpoint is known and in a discovery mode.
